meanings.definition: relating to or involving the introduction of ions into the body through the skin using a small electric current
meanings.sent1: The iontophoretic treatment helped deliver medication through the skin.
meanings.sent2: The doctor used an iontophoretic device to administer the ions.
meanings.sent3: The iontophoretic process felt like a gentle tickling sensation on the skin.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an iontophoretic current, spreading positivity everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The iontophoretic therapy made the concept of skin absorption easy to understand.

meanings.definition: a device or method that uses electric current to deliver ions into the body
meanings.sent1: The iontophoretic was essential for the treatment of the patient.
meanings.sent2: She purchased an iontophoretic for home use.
meanings.sent3: The iontophoretic hummed softly as it delivered the ions.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an iontophoretic, charged with emotion.
meanings.sent5: The iontophoretic revolutionized the way ions were administered into the body.
